tool_description: An API that gives you quotes from famous people and celebrities
name: Famous Quotes
title: Famous Quotes

api_list.name: get_random_quote_quotes_random_get
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://famous-quotes14.p.rapidapi.com/quotes/random"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "famous-quotes14.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
